original_text: The leaders of the priests and all the Jewish leaders wanted to punish Jesus with death. So they tried to find some people who would say things against Jesus that were not true.
korean_text: 대제사장들과 온 공회가 예수를 죽이려고 그를 칠 거짓 증거를 찾으매

sentences.original_text: wanted to punish Jesus with death
So they tried to find some people
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 어떤 사람들을 찾으려고 했습니다

sentences.original_text: who would say things against Jesus
